name: Game Studio Clicker
description:
Click the Squarator button and upgrade by publishing your game to android, releasing it on steam, making a website, etc.

Note: This is a game studio, and not a game, so don't question the purchases.

Coding: Me and @Zinnea / @Scratch Team (mainly me).

Idea: Me and @Zinnea / @ScratchTeam (mainly me).

Artwork: Me (for logo and text) and companies that made these products (mainly the companies that made these products).
